name: Liquid Space Dimension
description:
Liquid Space Dimension is an arcade shooter inspired by retro classics. Piloting the Star Drifter, you'll use a range of mechanics both familiar and new to get the highest score you can.


Features

  • On-Rails Action - Fly through colorful, low-poly levels and defeat as many enemies as you can.
  • Free Fly - Defeat enemies and powerful bosses in all direction while freely maneuvering in all directions.
  • Unique Mechanics - Fight with an arsenal of lasers, torpedoes, beams, and short range burst while evading danger with drifts, boost, and rolls.
  • Classic Mode - With a limited number of lives, play through 7 back-to-back levels and get the highest cumulative score you can.
  • Free Play - Play any level you like with unlimited lives to achieve a new high score.
